title: (x) squarish slab serif in Wired magazine - custom font by H&FJ {David}
content:
Wired Magazine has been using this alot lately.

Tried using Whatthefont on this typeface. Wondering if it’s custom.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224747im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/1_5257.jpg)

This is what Whatthefont found.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224747im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/3_3757.jpg)

Thanks.

 [‹ (x) Veer's fancy logo - custom design created in-house at Veer by Drew Ng {Grant}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224747/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36652 "Go to previous forum topic") ["You Are Leaving The American Sector" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224747/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36637 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jslicer

comments.content:
Custom job by Hoefler and Frere-Jones

David

Unavailable to the public then?

jslicer  
los angeles

I think this has appeared here more than 3 times. I know the Typophile search is bad, but you can [use Google](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224747/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&safe=off&pwst=1&q=+site:www.typophile.com+wired+font) too.
Yeah, not available, unfortunately. Consider [Stratum](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224747/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Stratum%20OT) as a substitute for the sans.
